register_screen.step_one: First step, enter your email address and your password to create your account. Don't forget to accept the app's GTC and privacy policy.
register_screen.step_two: Second step, enter the nickname that will be used to identify your account.
register_screen.step_three: Third step, find out your gender.
register_screen.step_four: Fourth step, fill in your age.
register_screen.step_five: Fifth step, fill in your nationality.
register_screen.empty_search_country: No countries found for this search
register_screen.step_six: And finally, add a profile picture to finalize your registration.

home_screen.push_token: Push token of the device to test push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging:

settings_screen.logout_content: Are you sure you want to disconnect ?
settings_screen.delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?

edit_account_screen.content: You can change your account information right here!

edit_security_screen.content:
You can change the security of your account directly here.
Please note that you will not be able to change your email and your password at the same time !
edit_security_screen.error_update: You can't change your email and password at the same time! One thing at a time..
edit_security_screen.content_verify: Enter your current password to verify and validate your current change
